Our Message World Wide 

     If we indeed have the truth for these last days, it must be carried to every nation, kindred, tongue, and people. Erelong the living and the 
                                                                           28
dead are to be judged according to the deeds done in the body, and the law of God is the standard by which they are to be tested. Then they must now be warned; God's holy law must be vindicated, and held up before them as a mirror. To accomplish this work, means is needed. I know that times are hard, money is not plenty; but the truth must be spread, and money to spread it must be placed in the treasury. . . .
